cyclone.name: ELSA
cyclone.current_location: about 40 mi SSW of Tiburon, Haiti and about 140 mi E of Kingston, Jamaica
cyclone.trajectory: forecast to turn northwest, cross central/western Cuba on Monday, then move into the Florida Straits and along the west coast of Florida

weather_observation.watch_coast: No tropical storm or hurricane watches in effect for Puerto Rico
weather_observation.warning_coast: No tropical storm or hurricane warnings in effect for Puerto Rico
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Southern Hispaniola, Jamaica, Cuba, Cayman Islands, Florida Keys and west coast of Florida
weather_observation.wind: Only passing squalls with occasional gusts; sustained tropical-storm-force winds not expected at San Juan
weather_observation.rainfall: Brief heavy showers possible, generally 1–3 inches
weather_observation.other_hazards: Dangerous rip currents and rough surf along north and south-facing beaches
